description:
Course Updated 22 January 2016

Why are 16,560 students wanting me to mentor them in 37 Udemy courses? 16,560 students have started learning from me since August 7th 2015. Shouldn't you find out why?

Are you ready to master negotiation once and for all? This essential skill will save you thousands or even save you thousands on deals.

You are about to learn negotiation strategies straight from the trenches. Nikhil has learnt negotiation from a very young age.

Born in a village in South Africa, he has negotiated his way to assist many of clients, ranging from small/medium businesses to INC 500 corporations to multi-million dollar businesses (and even billion dollar businesses).

Nikhil advises a number of high profile celebrities who have been featured on Miss USA, The Apprentice, Miss Universe, BET, WWE, CNN, ESPN, USA Today, Wall Street Journal, NBC, CBS, Fox, ABC, Entrepreneur Magazine and numerous other television shows and radio stations around the world

You will be exposed to:

- The ABN Technique and why this is essential to negotiating

- Strategies on how to avoid the Yes/No Trap

- How to walk away and still win at negotiation

- How having hard limits will make or break you

- and much more!
title: Negotiation Mastery - Skills for Business and Life
